EmailTemplate.description: Template for Home care provider Contract rejection notification sent out.
EmailTemplate.name: Home care provider Rejection Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Home care provider contract rejected - {!jj_rb_Rebate_Contract__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Contract Id: {!jj_rb_Rebate_Contract__c.Name} for {!jj_rb_Rebate_Contract__c.jj_rb_Product__c} is Rejected.
Regards, Rebate Management Team.
